name: Slumberstruck!
description:
Ever heard of the dangers of drowsy driving? Sounds like an interesting topic but you don't want to read educational stuff about it?

Well don't worry, now you can try it first-hand with the new sleep-deprived trucker driver simulator!

Fasten the seatbelt, tune into your favourite radio, and put the pedal to the metal!

-------------------------------------------INSTRUCTIONS------------------------------------------------

Make as many deliveries as you can by reaching the checkpoints on time.
Careful with the drowsiness! As a sleep-deprived driver, you will need a small nap now and then.

AWSD = Drive

Hold SPACE or MOUSE BUTTON = Nap for a bit

SHIFT or C = Switch the radio channel (some songs might make you drowsier than others, so... careful!)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
